distri: First of all it is interesting to observe that RbB is a stand alone genre of music. By stand alone we want to express the fact that very few RnB songs are also classified as another type of music. Intruitingly however, except for the intrumentalness RnB music seems to well represent the average song. This last sentence must be taken with care has the cause of that is also that Intrumentalness is the feature with is the more variable between genre than anyother feature.
